Internet Remarks: Are you looking for a charming little place to call home? An abundance of natural light floods the house, enjoy the view of Georgia Straight from your patio, dining room or den, and let the light of the magnificent sunsets complete your day.  Across the street, you will find one of the most beautiful public beaches & viewpoints, a great spot to set off in your kayak. If you have something a bit bigger in mind, take advantage of the boat launch. Finally, if you look to head into the forest, go up Selma Park road, where you access the Suncoaster Trail. Next step, come and look at 5285 Little Lane, in Sechelt, BC.
